jobs.title: AI Model Training - Competitive Programming
jobs.description: Looking for expert programmers to create and solve competitive programming problems to train our large language model for coding challenges.
requirements: Ph.D. in Computer Science or related field

jobs.title: Mathematical Reasoning Model Validation
jobs.description: Seeking mathematics experts to evaluate AI-generated solutions to complex mathematical problems, ranging from undergraduate to Olympiad levels.

jobs.title: Medical AI Advisory Project
jobs.description: Need medical professionals to assess and validate AI-generated medical advice and ensure accuracy in healthcare applications.

jobs.title: Legal AI Model Training
jobs.description: Seeking legal professionals to review and annotate AI outputs related to legal queries and document analysis.

jobs.title: Machine Learning Research Project
jobs.description: Looking for ML researchers to collaborate on benchmarking and improving AI model performance through experimental evaluations.
